pages.intro_page.name: Sleepcast
pages.intro_page.settings.to_wearable_se: Use heart rate and sleep sensors as a trigger
pages.intro_page.settings.to_st_setup_pa: Recommended. Use SmartThings events as a trigger
pages.intro_page.settings.to_app_setup_p: Choose what should happen when sleep mode begins
pages.intro_page.settings.oauth_out.name: Link with Sleepcast.io
pages.intro_page.settings.oauth_out.desc: View & manage your data by linking an account on Sleepcast.io
pages.intro_page.settings.help.name: Help & Support
pages.vizio_setup_page.name: Vizio Setup
pages.vizio_setup_page.settings.to_vizio: If you're hosting this application within the same network as your TV, you can automatically discover its IP.
If you know the TV's IP address, or if you've port-forwarded access to port 7345, you can use a publicly-accessible URL.
pages.trigger_wearable_setup_page.name: Wearables Triggers
pages.trigger_wearable_setup_page.settin: Install and link a companion app for your Samsung smartwatch. The companion app will relay your sleep activity level, when you fall asleep, we'll turn the TV off for you.
Samsung Galaxy & Gear smartwatches are supported.
pages.trigger_st_setup_page.name: SmartThings Triggers
pages.trigger_st_setup_page.sections.tri: Triggers • if any trigger events occur
pages.trigger_st_setup_page.settings.mod: Trigger when this location mode becomes active
pages.trigger_st_setup_page.settings.swi: Trigger when any of the following lights are turned off
pages.trigger_st_setup_page.sections.con: Conditions • if all conditions are met
pages.trigger_st_setup_page.settings.pre: Trigger when any of the following are present
pages.trigger_st_setup_page.settings.qui: Triggers will be disabled within this quiet period
pages.vizio_setup_auto_page.name: Automatic display discovery
pages.vizio_setup_manual_page.name: Connect your Vizio manually
pages.vizio_setup_manual_page.sections.p: Enter the IP and continue to pairing
pages.vizio_setup_manual_page.settings.t: Manually connect to your Vizio by IP
Include the port if you're accessing the TV through custom port-forwarding, otherwise the port is not necessary.
pages.vizio_setup_pairing_page.name: Pairing
Enter the pairing code to proceed
Look for a 4-digit pairing code on-screen
If nothing appears, hit BACK and then NEXT to trigger the pairing process again.
pages.vizio_setup_pairing_page_2.name: Pairing
pages.app_setup_page.name: Configure
Oops – looks like you got turned around!
pages.app_setup_page.settings.failed.nam: You need to add an Action Device first!
pages.app_setup_page.settings.failed.des: Just head on back to fix it up
pages.app_setup_page.sections.audio.name: Volume control
pages.app_setup_page.sections.power.name: Power control
pages.app_setup_page.settings.restoreVal: Restores the display to its settings just prior to triggering
pages.app_setup_page.settings.audio_warn: Volume level may not settle at requested value. Proceed with caution while testing this and be certain that you adjust this value conservatively.
pages.app_setup_page.settings.sleep.name: Sleep
pages.app_setup_page.settings.picture.de: Choose from your preset picture modes. NOTE: Some presets do not allow changing the Backlight
pages.app_setup_page.settings.blankScree: Turns off the display for audio-only mode
pages.vizio_setup_pairing_page_2.setting: Sleepcast is now connected to your Vizio – make sure to add triggers and device actions!
